PHRASE.LANG: Only the most dedicated PlayStation® gamers had PocketStation® [#Legal]
Seuls les plus grands fans de PlayStation® ont eu PocketStation® [#Legal]
Nur die hingebungsvollsten PlayStation®-Spieler besaßen PocketStation™. [#Legal]
Soltanto i giocatori del sistema PlayStation® più accaniti possedevano una PocketStation® [#Legal]

Only the most dedicated PlayStation® gamers had PocketStation® [#Legal]
